stories.Title: ChatGPT gets custom made
stories.Description: OpenAI has announced a new feature for ChatGPT Plus subscribers. With "custom instructions," you can set specific parameters for the bot to follow in subsequent chats.
stories.Tweet: ChatGPT gets custom made 📦 OpenAI has announced a new feature for ChatGPT Plus subscribers. With "custom instructions," you can set specific parameters for the bot to follow in subsequent chats. #ai https://www.engadget.com/chatgpt-update-allows-it-to-remember-who-you-are-and-what-you-like-183432396.html

stories.Title: GitHub’s latest announcement
stories.Description: With the limited public beta release of GitHub Copilot Chat, developers can now execute intricate coding tasks with simple prompts.
stories.Tweet: GitHub’s latest announcement  📦 With the limited public beta release of GitHub Copilot Chat, developers can now execute intricate coding tasks with simple prompts. #GitHub https://github.blog/2023-07-20-github-copilot-chat-beta-now-available-for-every-organization/

stories.Title: Getting started with Bing
stories.Description: Microsoft's powerful chatbot takes on ChatGPT with confidence. Discover how to maximize Bing Chat's potential and explore its advanced features in Microsoft Edge.
stories.Tweet: Getting started with Bing 📦 Microsoft's powerful chatbot takes on ChatGPT with confidence. Discover how to maximize Bing Chat's potential and explore its advanced features in Microsoft Edge. #bing https://www.zdnet.com/article/how-to-use-the-new-bing-and-how-its-different-from-chatgpt/

stories.Title: The aftermath of NASA's DART
stories.Description: Findings from Hubble Space Telescope analysis shows slow-moving boulders escaping the gravitational pull of the double asteroid system after DART's successful impact.
stories.Tweet: The aftermath of NASA's DART 📦 Findings from Hubble Space Telescope analysis shows slow-moving boulders escaping the gravitational pull of the double asteroid system after DART's successful impact. #science https://arstechnica.com/science/2023/07/hubble-is-able-to-spot-boulders-blasted-loose-by-the-dart-impact/

stories.Title: Trojan planets beyond our solar system
stories.Description: Chilean telescopes have detected a cloud of debris following a planet's orbit in the PDS 70 star system. Astronomers speculate it might be the first-ever evidence of orbital planetary twins.
stories.Tweet: Trojan planets beyond our solar system 📦 Chilean telescopes have detected a cloud of debris following a planet's orbit in the PDS 70 star system. Astronomers speculate it might be the first-ever evidence of orbital planetary twins. #science https://gizmodo.com/trojan-planet-suspected-sharing-same-orbit-sibling-1850660567

stories.Title: A neutron star mystery
stories.Description: Astronomers stumble upon an intensely magnetic object, a magnetar, exhibiting an intriguing anomaly: releasing radio waves every 22 minutes.
stories.Tweet: A neutron star mystery 📦 Astronomers stumble upon an intensely magnetic object, a magnetar, exhibiting an intriguing anomaly: releasing radio waves every 22 minutes. #science https://gizmodo.com/mysterious-space-object-magnetar-radio-waves-1850660319

stories.Title: Amazon aims for the stars
stories.Description: By investing $120 million in a processing facility at NASA's Kennedy Space Center, Amazon's Project Kuiper envisions global internet access through its satellite network.
stories.Tweet: Amazon aims for the stars 📦 By investing $120 million in a processing facility at NASA's Kennedy Space Center, Amazon's Project Kuiper envisions global internet access through its satellite network. #amazon https://www.cnbc.com/2023/07/21/amazon-kuiper-to-build-satellite-prep-facility-in-florida.html

stories.Title: All about: Samsung Galaxy Unpacked
stories.Description: On July 26th, Samsung's second Galaxy Unpacked event will draw attention as the company unveils the Galaxy Z Flip 5 and Z Fold 5. Anticipation builds for technology enthusiasts.
stories.Tweet: All about: Samsung Galaxy Unpacked 📦 On July 26th, Samsung's second Galaxy Unpacked event will draw attention as the company unveils the Galaxy Z Flip 5 and Z Fold 5. Anticipation builds for technology enthusiasts. #samsung https://www.theverge.com/23802344/samsung-galaxy-unpacked-july-2023-news

stories.Title: China’s cosmic adventure
stories.Description: China's human spaceflight program reveals ambitious plans for a new spacecraft. Capable of lunar missions and deep-space exploration, expected to fly between 2027 and 2028.
stories.Tweet: China’s cosmic adventure 📦 China's human spaceflight program reveals ambitious plans for a new spacecraft. Capable of lunar missions and deep-space exploration, expected to fly between 2027 and 2028. #china https://www.space.com/china-launch-new-astronaut-moon-spacecraft-2027

stories.Title: Volvo’s delayed journey
stories.Description: The automaker faces software complexities with the advanced lidar system, pushing production back "five or six months" for its new EX90.
stories.Tweet: Volvo’s delayed journey 📦 The automaker faces software complexities with the advanced lidar system, pushing production back "five or six months" for its new EX90. #volvo https://electrek.co/2023/07/21/volvo-ex90-production-delayed-when-electric-suv-will-arrive/

stories.Title: Tesla lands in Malaysia
stories.Description: The automaker enters the Southeast Asian market, launching electric vehicles at a pop-up location in Kuala Lumpur for test drives until October.
stories.Tweet: Tesla lands in Malaysia 📦 The automaker enters the Southeast Asian market, launching electric vehicles at a pop-up location in Kuala Lumpur for test drives until October. #tesla https://electrek.co/2023/07/20/tesla-launches-electric-vehicles-malaysia/

title: Customize your ChatGPT, Amazon's ambitious project, GitHub unveils Copilot Chat
